hotels.title: Serene Pennsylvania Mountain Escape with Indoor Swimming Pool, Golf & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of Pennsylvania's Allegheny Mountains with a stay at this historic resort. The luxurious retreat, renowned for its eight mineral springs, offers a unique blend of old-world charm and contemporary elegance. Indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the world-class Springs Eternal Spa, savour farm-to-table cuisine at the 1796 Room, or tee off at the resort's award-winning golf course. Explore the surrounding trails on foot or by bike, or take a leisurely stroll through the charming town of Bedford, just minutes away. Reconnect with nature in beautiful surroundings and choose from six onsite bars and restaurants to have a hearty meal and raise a toast to your escape. The mountains are calling.

hotels.title: Heritage Downtown Pittsburgh Escape Steps from Convention Center with Five Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Step back into Pittsburgh's Golden Age with a stay at this grand heritage hotel, located in the heart of the downtown business district. Steps away from the vibrant Cultural District and the bustling Market Square, this historic landmark is in the centre of it all, while providing easy access to the wider city, sitting adjacent to the Pittsburgh Metro Rail System. Each room is a testament to classic elegance, offering a glimpse into the city's rich history. Dine at the Terrace Room, known for its award-winning cuisine, or enjoy a cocktail at the Speakeasy, a hidden gem reminiscent of the Prohibition era. Stop by Mellon Square Coffee for a coffee and treat to start your day, or join local Steelers fans in The Tap Room, tasting an array of microbrews alongside their famous chilli.
